oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Dia!kwain (David Hoesar) (V)
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Baboons plan to attack ||xabbiten ||xabbiten. ||xabbiten ||xabbiten asks them what they are saying and then makes remarks about their ugly appearance and climbs a Krieboom tree. He deceives the baboons by calling out to white farmers as if they were near, because baboons fear white men and their guns. 1) p.5929v: ||xabbiten ||xabbiten told Dia!kwain and some of his other young relations this story when they were children, 2) p.5931v: what the head baboon is called, and its name in Dutch, 3) This story is found in Book V-24.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Lucy Lloyd |xam notebooks
oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Baboons and ||xabbiten ||xabbiten
